languages.text: "Я верю, ты не оставишь ни единого пятна на лике Простора. Серебристое сияние твоей души выжигает скверну дотла подобно звезде, рассекающей тьму!"
"I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"
languages.original_text: "Я верю, ты не оставишь ни единого пятна на лике Простора. Серебристое сияние твоей души выжигает скверну дотла подобно звезде, рассекающей тьму!"

traits.locale_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我相信，你绝不会放过科罗努斯扩区内的任何污秽。你灵魂中的银光将与如同划过黑暗的流星，把一切腐化烧成灰烬！”
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

traits.locale_text: “我相信，你绝不会放过科罗努斯扩区内的任何污秽。你灵魂中的银光将与如同划过黑暗的流星，把一切腐化烧成灰烬！”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je vous fais confiance pour éliminer toute trace de corruption dans les Étendues. Telle une étoile qui illuminerait les ténèbres, la luminescence argentée de votre âme consume la corruption ! »
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous fais confiance pour éliminer toute trace de corruption dans les Étendues. Telle une étoile qui illuminerait les ténèbres, la luminescence argentée de votre âme consume la corruption ! »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Confío en que no dejará ni rastro de impureza en la Extensión. ¡El resplandor plateado de su alma incinera la corrupción como una estrella atravesando la oscuridad!».
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

traits.locale_text: «Confío en que no dejará ni rastro de impureza en la Extensión. ¡El resplandor plateado de su alma incinera la corrupción como una estrella atravesando la oscuridad!».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「私は、あなたがエクスパンスの顔に汚れの一片も残さないと信じています。あなたの魂の銀の輝きは、暗闇を切り裂く星のように腐敗を焼き尽くします！」
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は、あなたがエクスパンスの顔に汚れの一片も残さないと信じています。あなたの魂の銀の輝きは、暗闇を切り裂く星のように腐敗を焼き尽くします！」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr keinen einzigen Flecken Fäulnis in der Ausdehnung bestehen lassen werdet. Der silberne Glanz Eurer Seele äschert die Korruption ein wie ein Stern, der die Dunkelheit durchschneidet!"
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich vertraue darauf, dass Ihr keinen einzigen Flecken Fäulnis in der Ausdehnung bestehen lassen werdet. Der silberne Glanz Eurer Seele äschert die Korruption ein wie ein Stern, der die Dunkelheit durchschneidet!"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"

languages.text: "Enginlik'te tek parça ahlaksızlık bırakmayacağına inanıyorum. Ruhunun gümüş ışıltısı, karanlığı delen bir yıldız gibi yozlaşmayı yakıp geçiyor!"
languages.original_text: "I have faith that you will leave no speck of foulness on the face of the Expanse. The silver luminescence of your soul incinerates corruption like a star cutting through the darkness!"
